panels.title: Fix missing animations on /onboarding
panels.scene: A village is shrouded in grey. The onboarding sign above the gate is static and boring. Knight waves his hand, releasing colorful pixie dust (CSS Keyframes). The sign bursts to life with sparkling animations, and the village regains its color.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: The onboarding is ALIVE! The sign... it wiggles!

panels.title: Remove duplicate header
panels.scene: Villagers are banging their heads against a stone wall (the onboarding quiz). The wall has two identical headers carved into it. The knight calmly chisels away one of the headers. Villagers stop banging their heads.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: He removed the extra header! We can think again!

panels.title: Increase hard conversation call duration to 5 minutes
panels.scene: A villager is screaming into a cracked horn (phone). The call cuts off after 3 minutes. The knight adjusts a tiny dial on a large clock tower, changing '3' to '5'. The villager smiles as he continues talking.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Five whole minutes of hard talk! Our problems are solved!

panels.title: 9 commits. Onboarding is FIXED... almost.
panels.scene: Knight is facepalming in a wooden chair. In the background, villagers are parading with a giant golden smartphone float and chanting 'On-Board-ing! On-Board-ing!'
